title: need a coach to teach me mid

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Valkrai,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=LK8k027A,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-15T10:25:54.875+0000)
>
> help pls

http://www.lol-coaching.com/coach.php?id=45223

Check out my profile, if you like what you see you can arrange a time for me to play with you and improve your gameplay!
Cheers,
Aezuros

P.S Mid is my least played role but I'm rather confident that I can teach you enough to improve even without extremely in-depth counterlane matchup knowledge.
Watch unswlolsoc on Youtube. It's a university that has LoL lectures about all roles and is VERY useful.
What parts (no im not a pro kek)

> What parts (no im not a pro kek)

last hitting and when to roam

last hitting is all lanes (cept jg, dif champs dif csing) roaming i would say when you get a tower or a few kills mid/jg
